00035 class KVILIB_API KviNickServRule : public KviHeapObject
00036 {
00037 protected:
00038         QString m_szRegisteredNick;         // my registered nickname
00039         QString m_szNickServMask;           // the NickServ service mask
00040         QString m_szMessageRegexp;          // the NickServ message regexp
00041         QString m_szIdentifyCommand;        // the IDENTIFY command to send to server
00042         QString m_szServerMask;             // the mask that the server must match (not used in per-network rules)
00043 public:
00044         KviNickServRule() : KviHeapObject() {};
00045         KviNickServRule(
00046                 const QString &szRegisteredNick,
00047                 const QString &szNickServMask,
00048                 const QString &szMessageRegexp,
00049                 const QString &szIdentifyCommand,
00050                 const QString &szServerMask = QString::null)
00051                 : KviHeapObject(),
00052                         m_szRegisteredNick(szRegisteredNick),
00053                         m_szNickServMask(szNickServMask),
00054                         m_szMessageRegexp(szMessageRegexp),
00055                         m_szIdentifyCommand(szIdentifyCommand),
00056                         m_szServerMask(szServerMask)
00057                 {};
00058 public:
00059         const QString & registeredNick() const { return m_szRegisteredNick; };
00060         const QString & nickServMask() const { return m_szNickServMask; };
00061         const QString & messageRegexp() const { return m_szMessageRegexp; };
00062         const QString & identifyCommand() const { return m_szIdentifyCommand; };
00063         const QString & serverMask() const { return m_szServerMask; };
00064         void setRegisteredNick(const QString &szRegisteredNick){ m_szRegisteredNick = szRegisteredNick; };
00065         void setNickServMask(const QString &szNickServMask){ m_szNickServMask = szNickServMask; };
00066         void setMessageRegexp(const QString &szMessageRegexp){ m_szMessageRegexp = szMessageRegexp; };
00067         void setIdentifyCommand(const QString &szIdentifyCommand){ m_szIdentifyCommand = szIdentifyCommand; };
00068         void setServerMask(const QString &szServerMask){ m_szServerMask = szServerMask; };
00069 public:
00070         // avoid crashes under windows
00071         static KviNickServRule * createInstance(const QString &szRegisteredNick,
00072                 const QString &szNickServMask,
00073                 const QString &szMessageRegexp,
00074                 const QString &szIdentifyCommand,
00075                 const QString &szServerMask = QString::null);
00076 
00077         void save(KviConfig * cfg,const QString &prefix);
00078         // returns false if the loaded data has no sense
00079         bool load(KviConfig * cfg,const QString &prefix);
00080         void copyFrom(const KviNickServRule &src);
00081 };

00084 {
00085 public:

00091         bool                          m_bEnabled;
00092 public:
00093         // avoid crashes under windows
00094         static KviNickServRuleSet * createInstance();
00095         void clear();
00096         bool isEnabled(){ return m_bEnabled; };
00097         void setEnabled(bool bEnabled){ m_bEnabled = bEnabled; };
00098         bool isEmpty(){ return m_pRules ? m_pRules->isEmpty() : true; };
00099         void addRule(KviNickServRule * r);
00100         KviNickServRule * matchRule(const QString &szNick,const KviIrcMask *nickServ,const QString &szMsg,const QString &szServer = QString::null);
